text:
Nr 3.3 of the code quality rules for marketplace submission states “3.3 Do Not Add Classes Inside the Rich Text Editor Source View.You must not include custom classes or IDs inside of content in the Rich Text Editor through the “Source Code” option.”

My problem: if i want to showcase a styled <blockquote> inside of an article or other styled html elements, i would need to do that. Is this still against the rules or are there exceptions?
